      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String name)
             throws InvalidFileNameException
        Sets settings name and verifies that it is a valid file name, ie no special characters.
        Parameters:
        name - The filename for the settings file including .yaml/.yml ending
        Throws:
        InvalidFileNameException - Throws if illegal filename
